headlines.description: Record signing Joelinton scored his first Premier League goal since August as Newcastle United secured a convincing 3-0 win.
Christian Pulisic and Olivier Giroud both found the net as a costly two minutes saw Chelsea overturn a 1-0 deficit to beat Aston Villa 2-1.

video.headline: Olley: goals crucial to Pulisic's Chelsea future

tracking.trackingName: INET_FC EPL Analysis (Olley: goals crucial to Pulisic's Chelsea future) 2020/06/21 GLOBAL

headlines.shortLinkText: Pulisic helps Chelsea see off Villa challenge

headlines.description: Liverpool's march to the Premier League title took a slight wobble as they were held to a 0-0 draw by Everton in the Merseyside derby.

video.headline: Nicol: Jurgen Klopp will be happy with a point

tracking.trackingName: INET_SOC EPL FCTV (Nicol: Jurgen Klopp will be happy with a point) 2020/06/21 GLOBAL

headlines.shortLinkText: Liverpool stumble on title march with Everton draw
